label: Rope
short_description: Two-ended rope for flexible grip and range of motion.

label: Lat Pulldown Bar
short_description: Long bar for wide-grip back exercises.

label: Straight Bar
short_description: Fixed straight bar for curls or pushdowns.

label: V-Grip
short_description: Narrow V-shaped handle for rows and pulldowns.

label: MAG Grip Bar
short_description: Ergonomic handles designed to reduce grip fatigue.

label: PRO-Style Bar
short_description: Wide bar with neutral-grip handles at the ends.

label: Multi/T-Bar Style
short_description: Heavy-duty handle for landmine or cable rows.

label: Multi-Row
short_description: Handle offering multiple grip widths for rowing.

label: EZ Bar (Cable)
short_description: Angled bar for cable curls or tricep work.

label: V-Bar
short_description: Fixed V-shaped bar primarily for tricep pushdowns.

label: Ankle Strap
short_description: Padded strap for lower body cable movements.

label: Ab Harness
short_description: Padded harness worn over shoulders for cable crunches.

label: Landmine
short_description: Floor-based pivot for rotational barbell work.
